entries.title: $300K Brink's heist: Men distract worker, thief swipes cash
entries.description: All three men remained at large as of Monday.

entries.title: On King's holiday, daughter calls for bold action over words
entries.description: America has honored Martin Luther King Jr. with a federal holiday for nearly four decades yet still hasn’t fully embraced and acted on the lessons from the slain civil rights leader, his youngest daughter said Monday

entries.title: US Rep. Bonamici recovering after being hit by car in Oregon
entries.description: Rep. Suzanne Bonamici of Oregon says she and her husband are recovering at home.

entries.title: Former Homeland Security official weighs in on Biden classified document probe
entries.description: ABC News contributor John Cohen spoke with "Start Here" about the ongoing probe into classified docs found in the president's home and offices.

entries.title: NYC mayor visits Texas border, blasts feds' migrant response
entries.description: During a visit to the Texas border city of El Paso, New York Mayor Eric Adams criticized the federal government’s response to the influx of immigrants into U.S. cities

entries.title: 14-year-old girl shoots, kills 11-year-old boy after allegedly aiming at someone else
entries.description: A 14-year-old girl is accused of shooting and killing an 11-year-old bystander after she was allegedly aiming at someone else, according to police.

entries.title: No visitor logs exist for Biden's private home, White House says
entries.description: House Republicans have demanded to see visitor logs from President Joe Biden's Wilmington home, where documents were found, but the White House says no such logs exist.

entries.title: EU seeking to offset Biden's green plans with own subsidies
entries.description: EU puts forward moves to ensure it would not be left behind by the U.S.

entries.title: Body of man missing since Hurriane Ian found on sunken boat
entries.description: The remains of a man who has been missing since Hurricane Ian are found.

entries.title: 6 family members, including baby, shot dead in targeted 'massacre': Sheriff
entries.description: Six people were gunned down at a central California home in what the sheriff is calling a targeted attack.

entries.title: Nepal plane crash black boxes recovered, as search continues for 3 passengers
entries.description: Search crews on Monday recovered the black boxes from Yeti Airlines NYT 691, which crashed in Nepal on Sunday with 72 people on board.

entries.title: Mexico imposes one of world’s strictest anti-smoking laws
entries.description: Mexican officials have imposed a total ban on smoking in public places, including hotels, beaches and parks.

entries.title: New Mexico top prosecutor to focus on child civil rights
entries.description: New Mexico's top prosecutor wants to start a conversation with lawmakers and the governor in hopes of charting a new course for a state beleaguered by violent crime, poor educational outcomes and persistently dismal child welfare rankings

entries.title: WATCH:  Walmart shopper knocks over knife-wielding suspect with a pole
entries.description: A knife-wielding man at a Walmart in Columbia, South Carolina, was disarmed in dramatic fashion as a shopper hit him from behind with a pole.

entries.title: WATCH:  Woman seen on ledge of high-rise building cleaning windows without safety equipment
entries.description: This woman was spotted wiping windows on a high-rise apartment building's ledge without any kind of safety harness.

entries.title: Arizona dad seeking answers after son dies in state care
entries.description: A 9-year-old boy whose father was in jail on a drug charge died under the custody of the Arizona child welfare agency

entries.title: Italian film legend Gina Lollobrigida dies at age 95
entries.description: Italian film star Gina Lollobrigida has died in Rome at age 95.

entries.title: UK govt may veto Scotland's gender self-recognition law
entries.description: The British government is considering blocking a new law that makes it easier for people in Scotland to legally change their gender

entries.title: London police officer admits multiple counts of rape
entries.description: A London police officer has admitted sexually assaulting a dozen women over a 17-year period

entries.title: Authorities investigate man's death following arrest during traffic stop
entries.description: Tyre Nichols, 29, of Memphis, died three days after he was arrested and hospitalized in critical condition.

entries.title: Australian boy wakes from coma after helicopter collision
entries.description: Four people died in the helicopter collision.

entries.title: Climate activists occupy giant digger at German coal mine
entries.description: Climate activists have occupied a giant digger at a coal mine in western Germany to protest the destruction of a nearby village for the expansion of a separate mine

entries.title: What to know about classified materials and how they're handled: ANALYSIS
entries.description: Revelations that President Joe Biden stored classified documents at his home and office echoes similar news about former President Donald Trump last year.

entries.title: Italy arrests Sicilian Mafia boss Matteo Messina Denaro
entries.description: Italian paramilitary police say they have arrested convicted Mafia boss Matteo Messina Denaro in a private clinic in Palermo

entries.title: 2 killed, 12 missing in north China chemical plant explosion
entries.description: A massive explosion at a chemical plant in northeastern China has killed at least two people and left 12 missing

entries.title: WATCH:  Yeti Airlines passenger plane crashes in Nepal
entries.description: The plane was flying from the capital of Kathmandu to Pokhara, a city in central Nepal, the country's minister said.

entries.title: Expanded US training for Ukraine forces begins in Germany
entries.description: The chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff says the U.S. military’s new, expanded combat training of Ukrainian forces has begun in Germany

entries.title: Alabama basketball player, 2nd man charged with murder
entries.description: Darius Miles and another man have been charged in a fatal shooting near campus.

entries.title: 2 EMS workers charged with murder after man dies in their care: Police
entries.description: Two EMS workers in Illinois are facing first-degree murder charges after a patient died in their care last month, according to the Springfield Police Department.

entries.title: Georgia player, staffer die in car crash hours after national championship parade
entries.description: University of Georgia offensive lineman Devin Willock and staff member Chandler LeCroy were killed in an early morning car crash on Sunday.
